nest: You can contribute by editing pages with the latest information (You'll need a password for it!) and add images or files via the repository. (You'll also both need a GitHub account and access to the repository.) If you can't access neither of them, you can instead contact @/Wiki Editors or @/Wiki Managers to help you!

patterns: how do i get an editor password
how do i get a password

nest: You'll need to contact Nyx for your own password in order to publish your edits. Do note that it is on a trust basis, so you should also be pretty reputable after obtaining it!

patterns: what may happen to the fandom wikis
what will happen to the fandom wikis
omg what happened to the fandom wiki

nest: As more pages get ported over time, the less we focus on the fandom version especially with the more newest additions, it is unforunate, but wiki.wolfdo.gg is a much better to use platform than fandom.

patterns: how do i add custom dialogue
how do i make dialogue tips

nest: **If you mean the Tips Dialogue / Dialogue in the Lower-Right Corner:** You can create custom dialogue for characters (or rarely, contributors like potentially yourself!) using the repository. You'll also need to create your own character first in order for it to be registered. Images and poses are also completely optional! | **If you mean the Dialogue Emulation:** You'll need access to the repository in order to edit or add custom emulations, we recommend following a template from an existing .json to give you into the ropes of how it works!
For now, you can add content/attatchments to the wiki by **Pull Requests**
..if you even know what that is anyways..

no-response: babbert does not understand your question.
